name: At All Costs
description:
Enter Terminus, the last city left on an Earth ravaged by pollution and climate change. Play as Alexandra Sims, a recently promoted investigator working for the Nwaeri-Carlisle Corporation. After the BioKey, a device giving access to the company’s entire security network, is stolen, you are one of the investigators tasked with tracking down the thieves and returning the BioKey.

Over the course of your investigation, you will discover evidence, interview witnesses, and explore new areas of Terminus to learn who stole the BioKey, and where they took it, and how to get it back.

This is a final project for LMC 4720 at Georgia Tech. It is part of a larger group project with multiple different games taking place in the same setting, Terminus.

You can play the previous game, "On Stained Glass" by Cat Naomi, at https://catnaomi.github.io/On-Stained-Glass/
